scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npm run build && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
